name: Ranveer Brar

recipeDetail.name: Butter Chicken
recipeDetail.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook chicken in butter and add pureed tomatoes and more spices. Add cream and serve.

recipeDetail.name: Palak Paneer
recipeDetail.method: Blanch spinach and puree. Cook onions and tomatoes with spices. Add spinach and paneer and simmer.

recipeDetail.name: Chole Bhature
recipeDetail.method: Soak chickpeas and cook with onions, tomatoes and spices. Make dough with flour and water and fry into bhature.

recipeDetail.name: Biryani
recipeDetail.method: Cook rice separately. Cook chicken with onions, tomatoes and spices. Layer rice and chicken and bake.

recipeDetail.name: Samosa
recipeDetail.method: Make dough with flour and water. Cook potatoes and peas with spices. Stuff dough with filling and fry into samosas.

desc: Ranveer Brar - With over 20 years of culinary experience, Ranveer Brar is a well-known chef in India and abroad. He has hosted several cooking shows and authored several cookbooks.

desc: Sanjeev Kapoor - Sanjeev Kapoor is a celebrity chef, author, and television host. He is known for his popular cooking show Khana Khazana, which has been running for over two decades. He has also authored over 150 cookbooks and is considered one of the most prominent chefs in India.

desc: Vikas Khanna - Vikas Khanna is an award-winning chef, restaurateur, and cookbook author. He has cooked for several world leaders and celebrities, including former US President Barack Obama and Queen Elizabeth II. He is also known for his philanthropic work, including his Feed India initiative during the COVID-19 pandemic.
